alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 27 at 8:21PM CDT until August 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTY... At 821 PM CDT, The public reported recent heavy rain from thunderstorms in the City of Montgomery. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Montgomery, Alabama State University, Alabama State Capitol, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Gunter Air Force Base, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Lagoon Park, Maxwell Air Force Base, Eastdale Mall, Woodcrest, Auburn University In Montgomery, Hunter and Mitylene. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
